summary:
**Capital Raising Announcement Summary:**  
- **Structure:** Placement under LR7.1 capacity  
- **Amount Raised:** AUD $650,000 (216.7M shares @ $0.003/share)  
- **Use of Proceeds:** Los Lirios Antimony Mine restart (70% EVR-owned) and working capital  
- **Director Participation:** New directors committed AUD $200,000 (combined) to placement.  

**Board Changes:**  
- **New Appointments:** Shane Menere (Non-Executive Chairman), Justin Werner (Non-Executive Director).  
- **Remuneration:** 20M shares + 20M options ($0.003 exercise, 1-year expiry) each (subject to shareholder approval).  

**Project Updates:**  
- **Focus Shift:** Relinquishing Parag licenses (Peru) to conserve cash; prioritizing Los Lirios (high-grade antimony).  
- **Catalyst:** Restart of historic Los Lirios open-pit mines (sampling confirmed high-grade ore).  

**Broker Fees:** 20M shares + 20M options (same terms as directors).  

**Trading Halt:** Lifted post-announcement.  

**Material Omission:** No explicit timetable for placement completion or project milestones.
